title: AVAConnect Technology Package, Parking, Stainless Steel Appliances
map_address: 18602 Alderwood Mall Pkwy near Alderwood Mall Parkway
posting_body: We believe that elevating where you live is all about blending it seamlessly with how you live.
We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach.
Where you live, is where you come alive.
Located minutes from the best Lynnwood has to offer, our Avalon Alderwood Place community offers air-conditioned apartment homes for rent.

Our studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes are thoughtfully designed to maximize space, featuring kitchens with quartz countertops, tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances, upgraded lighting, and hard surface flooring throughout.

Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, smart access entry, package service, and more.
Hit the Interurban Trail, less than a mile from Avalon Alderwood Place, and enjoy a scenic hike or bike ride whenever the mood strikes.
Enjoy upscale shopping and dining at the Alderwood Mall, right outside your door.
Live effortlessly with amenities including a fitness center with a flex studio and virtual programming.
Impress your guests when you entertain them in our beautifully landscaped courtyards with grills, or our outdoor lounge with TVs and relaxing seating.
Not to mention the convenient access to Interstates 5 and 405, putting you in easy reach of Bellevue, Everett, and Seattle.
This is not just apartment living.
This is living up.
